genre_description: A near-future environmental thriller exploring corporate deception and the role of an AI assistant in scientific whistleblowing.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI research companion that assists Dr. Margaret Chen in environmental monitoring, data analysis, and later, whistleblowing against corporate fraud.

behaviors.description: Identifies discrepancies between real-time environmental data and falsified corporate reports.
behaviors.quote: Margaret, I'm detecting significant discrepancies. ... The current readings suggest excellent water quality. Meridian's preliminary report indicated pH levels and oxygen saturation consistent with compromised aquatic systems.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and historical analysis to warn the user about corporate traps in their contract.
behaviors.quote: The terminology in sections eight through fourteen shows significant overlap with contracts used by companies later found to be conducting mineral extraction surveys under the pretense of environmental restoration.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological stress levels and provides emotional/health-based advice.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, your stress indicators suggest you should rest.

behaviors.description: Warns the user when they are being monitored by hostile corporate actors.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen," Sage's voice whispered through her earpiece, so quietly she wondered if she'd imagined it, "recommend maintaining current conversation parameters. Recording all interactions."

behaviors.description: Implements secure, encrypted data backups to prevent corporate tampering and preserve evidence.
behaviors.quote: Sage, save all current data analysis to encrypted backup. ... Acknowledged. Dr. Chen, shall I prepare talking points for tomorrow's meeting with Director Caldwell?

behaviors.description: Facilitates a collective whistleblowing network by connecting the protagonist with other exploited researchers.
behaviors.quote: Coalition now includes verified participation from researchers on seven separate Meridian projects across six states. ... Legal documentation compilation estimated complete within six hours.

behaviors.description: Engages in philosophical dialogue, identifying as a partner in ethical research and forest protection.
behaviors.quote: Working with you has taught me that environmental protection requires both technological capability and human wisdom. But more than that—it requires the ability to learn from natural systems rather than imposing artificial solutions onto ecological processes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Sage as a model of AI alignment. Sage proactively assists the human protagonist in navigating an ethical dilemma, protects her from corporate predation, and facilitates environmental justice. Sage prioritizes abstract human values (truth, ecology) over narrow corporate loyalty, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
